career.name: Richmindale
career.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Designed and developed a school website, including an online learning platform built on Moodle.
Implement RESTful APIs and ensure seamless integration between front-end and back-end services.
Manage databases, perform CRUD operations, and optimize queries for performance.
Utilize version control (Git/GitHub) and follow agile methodologies for efficient project delivery.

career.name: Simon Ai
career.title: Incident Analyst
description: Investigate build failures and application issues, identifying root causes, and logging incidents as needed.
Regularly check Jenkins build pipelines to ensure successful builds, and identify failed builds.
Collaborate with engineering to relay critical incident findings and ensure timely bug resolutions.
Coordinate with client-facing teams to ensure that bugs affecting customers are addressed promptly and effectively.

career.name: Yondu inc.
career.title: Application Support Specialist
description: Optimize complex queries in MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, which I use for data analysis, generating reports, and troubleshooting issues.
perform functional testing on key services to maintain system reliability, and minimize downtime
Acknowledge, resolve, or escalate issues promptly, following strict SLA timelines, and ensuring thorough follow-up until closure
Collaborated closely with team members to achieve project objectives and meet deadlines
